title.rendered: How to Create Your Own Product Line for e-Commerce

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 38:29 — 35.2MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 38:29 — 35.2MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Moving from reselling physical products – whether dropshipping on Shopify or Retail Arb on Amazon – to developing your own products is a big step. It’s really the key to creating a really valuable, sellable business. This is the real prize these days – I know so many business owners who have sold their product businesses for high 6 or 7 figures. If you’re going to keep owning your business, it also means it’s defensible and profitable for you. 

But it is a big, expensive and complex undertaking compared to simply reselling others’ products. So today we’re going to go over how to approach this complex process in a structured way to get you the best chance of a profitable product that gives you profit and makes your business valuable and – if you choose – sellable .  

On this episode you’ll learn:

  • How do we best go about developing custom products
  • Big Area No. 1 – Market research
  • Brainstorm Products
  • Assess Market
  • Find members of target market
  • Product Development : Suppliers and Samples
  • Customize Your Products
